item.title: Palantir gets a buy rating from Loop Capital, which calls for more than 25% upside
item.description: Loop Capital initiated coverage of Palantir with a buy rating and $141 price target, which implies 25.8% potential upside after Wednesday's pullback.

item.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The major averages posted modest gains on Wednesday, with the S&P 500 closing at another record. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Thursday.

item.title: Wait for buying opportunities in stocks such as Walmart, strategist says
item.description: Future dips in Walmart and Bumble shares could be an opportunity, according to Jay Woods, chief global strategist at Freedom Capital Markets.

item.title: Turn to these solid dividend payers to smooth your portfolio's ride during rocky times
item.description: CNBC Pro screened for dividend aristocrats that not only have a history of raising payouts, but also have upside ahead, according to analysts.

item.title: 2024 laggards due for a comeback this year, according to Jefferies
item.description: Some laggards from 2024 could be due for a swing to the upside in the new year, according to Jefferies.
